description:
This file provides platform-dependent and general utility functions for the Daemon Engine TCP object, including the creation function for this object.

It defines a function 'AnscCreateDaemonEngineTcp' that creates and returns a TCP daemon engine object by calling 'AnscDetoCreate'.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateDaemonEngineTcp(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of the Daemon Engine TCP object, passing through provided context handles.
